title: Half The Topics in These forums are About Bans
body:
Please stop complaining about your bans.

Everyone keeps posting these "why was I banned?" threads, with chat logs that are horrendous. You all deserve your bans as far as I can tell.

But what would I know?
My original account was perma-banned on NA (before OCE existed), and I reformed.
I used to be as toxic as nuclear waste, I know that.
I have been clean for 5+ years.

Stop being a douche and you won't have an issue.

replies.body:
sorry mate but there are larger things at play here. this is not just about toxic people copping well deserved bans.

This is about a fundamentally broken system, skipping punishment tiers because of what a bot picks up (irrespective of context) and a player behaviour team treating players - who have legitimate reasons to request support - with contempt and bad attitudes.
I have been playing ARAMs and AI (Intermediate), on an average day i report at least 5 bots.... I should rename myself to bot buster

I'd agree if the bot didn't suddenly without warning get worse to the point where it's 14 day banning things that don't deserve 14 day bans.

I'm all for riot actually pulling their finger out and banning properly (though they still aren't, because their keywords aren't the best) but they can't do 14 day bans for this shit.

I know the chat bot is broken, and I have said so before, even in the last day or two.
I'm just saying that I see so many people posting "why was I banned", and they include exactly why they were banned in their OP (via chat logs).
They are so deluded that they don't even understand how toxic they are.
but alot of them are also unfairly given bans but even with proof of their chat logs they ge treated like a toxic player and thrown out by support with little to no help

I sometimes act salty when I get abused, I had a 2 week ban that I posted up, didnt swear or abuse anyone at all, and I got banned for defending myself. I was told to kill myself, hang myself, drink bleach all in chat. They didn't get banned. I got banned for saying they were rude.
